#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

char a[455], b[455], c[455];
int dp[455][455][455];

int main() {
  int tc;
  scanf("%d", &tc);
  while (tc--) {
    scanf("%s%s%s", a, b, c);
    int p = strlen(a), q = strlen(b), r = strlen(c);
    memset(dp, 0, sizeof dp);
    for (int i = 1; i <= p; i++) {
      for (int j = 1; j <= q; j++) {
        for (int k = 1; k <= r; k++) {
          dp[i][j][k] = max(max(dp[i - 1][j][k], dp[i][j - 1][k]),
              dp[i][j][k - 1]);
          if (a[i - 1] == b[j - 1] && b[j - 1] == c[k - 1]) {
            dp[i][j][k] = max(dp[i][j][k], dp[i - 1][j - 1][k - 1] + 1);
          }
        }
      }
    }
    int ans = p + q + r - 3 * dp[p][q][r];
    printf("%d\n", ans);
  }
}
